About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

Bio

I am an aspiring web developer with interest in mobile app development as well. I've spent the majority of my post-grad career job searching and acquiring additional knowledge within these fields.

Education

University of California San Diego

B.S. in Mathematics - Computer Science

I began my undergraduate at UCSD in September 2014 and graduated with a B.S. in Math-CS in June of 2018.

Technical Strengths

Languages: Java, Python, Javascript, C++, HTML, CSS, Matlab

Frameworks & Runtimes: React/Redux, Node.js, Angular, Express

Databases: SQL, NoSQL, MySQL

Tools: Git, Vim, Linux/Unix, MacOS, Windows
